name: sum.vim
summary: sum the values of a range of rows
description:
A little script that sum some values of a range of rows. That's all :)
Sum.vim use the powerfull bc utility (you must install it!).
The script work also with older version of vim... i tested it also under win32 and it work (of course you must install the porting of bc)
install_details: just put sum.vim in the plugin directory :)
